select t1.SampleNum, t1.SampleType,t1.SamplePos, t1.CreateTime, t1.IsOperateDilution, t1.SampleState, t1.IsAudit, t1.IsPrinted, t2.SampleID, t2.PatientName, t2.Sex, t2.Age from SampleTb t1 left join PatientInfoTb t2 on t1.SampleNum = t2.SampleNum and t1.CreateTime = t2.InputTime
t1.SampleState in (#Completed#,#Starting#,#NoStart#)
t1.IsEmergency in (#常规样本#,#急诊#)
t1.SampleNum=#SampleNum#
t2.PatientName=#PatientName#
t2.SampleID=#SampleID#
t1.CreateTime between #StartTime# and #EndTime# and t1.IsDelete=0 order by t1.CreateTime asc

select t1.SampleType, t1.CreateTime, t1.IsOperateDilution, t1.SampleState, t1.IsAudit, t1.IsPrinted, t2.* from SampleTb t1 left join PatientInfoTb t2 on t1.SampleNum = t2.SampleNum and t1.CreateTime = t2.InputTime where t1.CreateTime=#CreateTime# and t1.SampleNum=#SampleNum#
select * from SampleResultTb where SampleNum=#SampleNum# and SampleCreateTime = #CreateTime#
statements.statement: select * from SampleResultTb where SampleNum=#SampleNum# and SampleType=#SampleType# and DATEDIFF(dd,SampleCreateTime,#StartDateTime#) = 0
update SampleTb set IsDelete=1 where SampleNum=#SampleNum# and CreateTime=#CreateTime#
update TaskTb set TaskState=#TaskState# where SampleNum=#SampleNum# and CreateDate=#CreateTime#
update SampleTb set IsAudit=#IsAudit# where SampleNum=#SampleNum# and DATEDIFF(dd,CreateTime,#ApplyTime#) = 0
update SampleResultTb set IsResurvey=#IsResurvey# where SampleCreateTime=#ApplyTime# and SampleNum=#SampleNum# and ProjectName=#ProjectName#
update SampleResultTb set Confirm=1 where SampleNum=#SampleNum# and SampleCreateTime=#ApplyTime# and ProjectName=#ProjectName#
update SampleResultTb set Confirm=0 where SampleNum=#SampleNum# and SampleCreateTime between #StartApplyTime# and #EndApplyTime# and ProjectName=#ProjectName#
select * from SampleResultTb where TCNO=#TCNO# and SampleCreateTime between #StartTime# and #EndTime#
